pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate Recursive Mazes // Supports the generation of parallelogram, equilateral triangle, regular hexagon, isosceles trapezoid, Koch snowflake, 'hexaflake', Sierpinski triangle, Sierpinski carpet and Sierpinski trapezoid mazes via 'TurtleGraphics'. Mazes are generated by the recursive method: the domain is divided into sub-domains in which mazes are generated, then dividing lines with holes are drawn between them, see J. Buck, Recursive Division, http://weblog.jamisbuck.org/2011/1/12/maze-generation- recursive-division-algorithm.
